replies.body: Inb4 it's dynamic Q in disguise as a "social experiment".
They went back allowing premade duos, so it might as well had stayed as DQ for all the good it will do.
They allowed duos before dynamic queue was released. Don't see what you're yipping off about.

Exactly, and people were complaining back then just as I am now. The entire point for DQ was to have a pure solo queue in the first place. Perhaps you'd see it if you weren't too busy drooling for the shinny old thing dangling in front of you like a little goldfish. I guess I should envy you though, they do say ignorance is a bliss. Maybe idiocy is too.
